movies.title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
movies.cast: Joe Mantegna, Ben Kingsley, Max Pomeranc, Joan Allen
movies.desc: A prepubescent chess prodigy is encouraged to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

movies.title: Bobby Fischer Against the World
movies.cast: Bobby Fischer, David Edmonds, Anthony Saidy, Susan Polgar
movies.desc: 'Bobby Fischer Against the World' is a documentary feature exploring the tragic and bizarre life of the late chess master Bobby Fischer. The drama of Bobby Fischer's career was undeniable, from his troubled childhood, to his rock star status as World Champion and Cold War icon, to his life as a fugitive on the run. This film explores one of the most infamous and mysterious characters of the 20th century.

movies.title: Queen of Katwe
movies.cast: Madina Nalwanga, David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o, Martin Kabanza
movies.desc: A Ugandan girl sees her world rapidly change after being introduced to the game of chess.

movies.title: Pawn Sacrifice
movies.cast: Tobey Maguire, Liev Schreiber, Peter Sarsgaard, Michael Stuhlbarg
movies.desc: Set during the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers and his own struggles as he challenges the Soviet Empire.

movies.title: The Dark Horse
movies.cast: Cliff Curtis, James Rolleston, Kirk Torrance, James Napier Robertson
movies.desc: A brilliant but troubled New Zealand chess champion finds purpose by teaching underprivileged children about the rules of chess and life.

movies.title: Game Over
movies.cast: Marc Ghannoum, Joel Benjamin, Michael Greengard, Anatoli Karpov
movies.desc: In 1997, chess champion Garry Kasparov goes head-to-head against IBM's computer, Deep Blue, and accuses IBM of cheating its way to victory. Interviews with Kasparov, his manager and members of the Deep Blue team illuminate the controversy.

movies.title: Fresh
movies.cast: Sean Nelson, Giancarlo Esposito, Samuel L. Jackson, N'Bushe Wright
movies.desc: Death and violence anger a twelve-year-old drug courier, who sets his employers against each other.

movies.title: Knight Moves
movies.cast: Christopher Lambert, Tom Skerritt, Codie Lucas Wilbee, Joshua Murray
movies.desc: During a chess tournament, grand master Peter is suspected of murdering Debi after sex. He helps the police as the murders continue.

movies.title: The Luzhin Defence
movies.cast: John Turturro, Emily Watson, Geraldine James, Stuart Wilson
movies.desc: Two worlds collide when an eccentric genius falls in love with a strong-willed society beauty.

movies.title: Knights of the South Bronx
movies.cast: Ted Danson, Malcolm David Kelley, Brian Markinson, Kate Vernon
movies.desc: A business man decides that he wants to teach school in the inner city and chooses a tough school in the South Bronx. He teaches the children how to play the game of chess, and along the way they learn a lot about life.
